<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Add passes that optimize instruction level parallelism for out-of-order</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// targets. These passes are run while the machine code is still in SSA</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Add the complete set of target-independent postISel code generator passes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This can be read as the standard order of major LLVM CodeGen stages. Stages</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// with nontrivial configuration or multiple passes are broken out below in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// add%Stage routines.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Any CodeGenPassBuilder&lt;Derived, TargetMachine&gt;::addXX routine may be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// overriden by the Target. The addPre/Post methods with empty header</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// implementations allow injecting target-specific fixups just before or after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// major stages. Additionally, targets have the flexibility to change pass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// order within a stage by overriding default implementation of add%Stage</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// routines below. Each technique has maintainability tradeoffs because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// alternate pass orders are not well supported. addPre/Post works better if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the target pass is easily tied to a common pass. But if it has subtle</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// dependencies on multiple passes, the target should override the stage</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Derived, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TargetMachineT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/#aa3cda6e4a4f17e5759b544a4c7ec494c"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/#aa3cda6e4a4f17e5759b544a4c7ec494c">CodeGenPassBuilder&lt;Derived, TargetMachineT&gt;::addMachinePasses</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/addmachinepass">AddMachinePass</a> &amp;addPass)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add passes that optimize machine instructions in SSA form.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1005"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Add passes that optimize machine instructions in SSA form.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1006"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Derived, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TargetMachineT&gt;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1015"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1019"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the target requests it, assign local variables to stack slots relative</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1021"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to one another and simplify frame index references where possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"><span class="doxyHighlight">  addPass(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/localstackslotallocationpass">LocalStackSlotAllocationPass</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// With optimization, dead code should already be eliminated. However</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// there is one known exception: lowered code for arguments that are only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// used by tail calls, where the tail calls reuse the incoming stack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// arguments directly (see t11 in test/CodeGen/X86/sibcall.ll).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><span class="doxyHighlight">  addPass(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadmachineinstructionelimpass">DeadMachineInstructionElimPass</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Allow targets to insert passes that improve instruction level parallelism,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// like if-conversion. Such passes will typically need dominator trees and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop info, just like LICM and CSE below.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1103"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1135"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The machine scheduler may accidentally create disconnected components</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when moving subregister definitions around, avoid this by splitting them to</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Allow targets to expand pseudo instructions depending on the choice of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// registers before MachineCopyPropagation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1147"><span class="doxyHighlight">    derived().addPostRewrite(addPass);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1148"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Copy propagate to forward register uses and try to eliminate COPYs that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// were not coalesced.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1151"><span class="doxyHighlight">    addPass(MachineCopyPropagationPass());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1152"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Run post-ra machine LICM to hoist reloads / remats.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: can this move into MachineLateOptimization?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    addPass(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinelicmpass">MachineLICMPass</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1158"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1159"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===---------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Post RegAlloc Pass Configuration</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===---------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1163"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Add passes that optimize machine instructions after register allocation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1165"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Derived, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TargetMachineT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1166" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/#ad632c4c783e5170dd972a8d18836c0e9"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/#ad632c4c783e5170dd972a8d18836c0e9">CodeGenPassBuilder&lt;Derived, TargetMachineT&gt;::addMachineLateOptimization</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/addmachinepass">AddMachinePass</a> &amp;addPass)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Branch folding must be run after regalloc and prolog/epilog insertion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  addPass(BranchFolderPass());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1170"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Tail duplication.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that duplicating tail just increases code size and degrades</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// performance for targets that require Structured Control Flow.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In addition it can also make CFG irreducible. Thus we disable it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/#a534105ec90dac84f7e87451abf4b528d">TM</a>.requiresStructuredCFG())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    addPass(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/tailduplicatepass">TailDuplicatePass</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1177"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cleanup of redundant (identical) address/immediate loads.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  addPass(MachineLateInstrsCleanupPass());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1180"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Copy propagation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  addPass(MachineCopyPropagationPass());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1183"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1184"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Add standard basic block placement passes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1186"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Derived, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TargetMachineT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1187" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/#ac7afb20962e71fd338b570303da8c45f"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/#ac7afb20962e71fd338b570303da8c45f">CodeGenPassBuilder&lt;Derived, TargetMachineT&gt;::addBlockPlacement</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  addPass(MachineBlockPlacementPass());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegenpassbuilder/#a9a8ef18a6785a2e0c11995308ccfba2b">Opt</a>.EnableBlockPlacementStats)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    addPass(MachineBlockPlacementStatsPass());</span></CodeLine>
